title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.5 - Time for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 226.5 - Time for public inspection

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and
copying on any day that the offices of the board are open for business during
the hours from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
226.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
